data.message: You sellout piece of shit. I have honestly deemed you the GOAT in rap. Now your nothing better than weird al, you damn puppet. Attention Marshall: you "had" white conservative supporters. Well fu%# that now. Stick with rap idiot.

replies.message:
Lol...you mean he had racist fans. He's prolly the only rap artist you ever claimed.
Byebye
it's was between Eminem and PAC actually. But listen Jeffrey, I just made a new batch of koolaid. Come sip, damn libturd
Back to Kid Rock for you. Toodles

Hey Becky 🚶💨💨💨. You're like 106. Grow up. I literally have stated Eminem as number 1 to everyone I have spoken to with that convo. The fucking idiot needs to stay in rap and not in politics. Ever realize he dogged on bill and Hillary Clinton, and now trump. Maybe those rhymes he spit before being famous have him scared, but don't turn on the political stunt. Shit is completely unnecessary. I am confident in saying at least 75% of his earnings by purchase are white. Probably at least with conservative views. So in essence only hurting himself, but like I said golden girl, you keep Eminem. I'll be fine without him, actually replaced him with grand funk railroad tonight. God bless you.
Meant to add in there that he didn't say shit about Obama. 🤔🤔🤔🤔. Scared lost soul is what Eminem is.
Another puppet who can't think for himself! FUCK GOAT
So sad Marsha.
Triggered 😂
75 percent. Any proof of that?
Like he said sir. Fuck you and your trump humping self.
Trumps not a conservative so why would bashing him anger conservatives?
Lol only Trump fans would tell you you're no longer considered the goat because of your political views instead of based of your skills and rapping abilities.
#fucktrump
Did you get this mad over Mosh? Or when he told Tipper Gore “fuck you” or made fun of Cheney’s heart attacks? Why are you stupid fucking republican snowflakes still so enamored with Drumpf?
So long Virgil.
Freedom of speech. Dont like it move to Korea

Ok, and I combat that with my freedom of speech against his....no Korea for me. Sounds more like a plan for you socialist communist libturds. And so long aat, trump is here, move. Yeah I did get pissed over mosh, pretty hypocritical for getting at the bush Iran, meanwhile not a peep about obamas 1.7 billion to Iran.....crickets. Dude never went after Obama, that is internalized racism. My point, fnofe-from now on fuck Eminem
Can't separate you from your real family.
^ 😂😂😂 you idiotic socialist. S@&t for brains I swear.
Take a chill pill
Lol go suck trumps dick fuckhead Eminem dosent want fans like you deal with it and he Doesn't  need to " sell out " to get fans he's already got lots of good people as fans so fuck you
